name: Tank Tussle (Tennissky)
description:
This is a simple 1v1 tank game that you can play with a friend! You can play as the light tank who is faster and shoots a barrage of missiles. You can play as the normal tank who can charge their shots really quick, making it rather effective at long ranges. Finally there is the heavy tank, with the largest ammo amount to overwhelm your opponents!

It is quite simple to start playing. First you both download the game. Then you select both a tank and a color of your choice. After that one person creates a lobby that the other can join using the join code provided in the top right. 

To move use wasd. and the mouse to shoot. Hold your right mouse button for a charged shot, dealing more damage or firing more missiles.
